instructions:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and whirl on high speed until smooth.
Serve immediately, or store in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple, orange, strawberry or other juice made from all fruit
1 (8 ounce) container low-fat Lucerne Vanilla Yogurt
1 cup frozen strawberries, raspberries, or blueberries
1 tablespoon strawberry or raspberry jam made from all fruit (optional)
title: Berry Good Blender Blaster
